text: Forum: Aryan_NandaJanuary 14, 2025,  7:51pm9foxsquirrel:I can see a BB specific gpt being hosted on a server running django that is querying an AI provider.The primary goal of this project would be to develop a minimal UI that allows us to test the model and evaluate its usability and scope. Initially, the focus will be on verifying the modelâ€™s performance against specific benchmarks. If the model meets these benchmarks, we can then consider expanding the project into a full-stack application. This expanded version could include features likeauthentication, rate limits, user access tiers, and history
